mutants.code:
def minimum_hours_to_obtain_armor_and_weapon(n, m, q, synergizing_pairs):
    a_b = set(synergizing_pairs)
    if n >= m:
        (n, m) = (m, n)
    dp = [-1] * (n + 1)
    dp[1] = 1
    result = 0
    while dp[n] != m:
        new_dp = dp[:]
        for i in range(1, n + 1):
            if dp[i] == -1:
                continue
            x = i + dp[i] + ((i, dp[i]) in a_b)
            new_dp[i] = max(new_dp[i], min(x, m))
            new_dp[min(x, n)] = max(new_dp[min(x, n)], dp[i])
        dp = new_dp
        result += 1
    return result

    a_b = set(synergizing_pairs)

    return result
